DOC.brief_summary: This phase IIIb , observer-blind study evaluate immunogenicity safety GSK Biologicals ' Boostrix® vaccine adult ( extend indication ) age 65 year old .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation GlaxoSmithKline Biologicals ' Boostrix® Vaccine Comparison With Decavac™ Vaccine .
